name: Debt Collectors
description:
Uh oh, looks like someone forgot to pay their debts... the loan sharks are coming, and you don't quite have the money on you right now. What you do have though? Blindingly-bright neon bullets. I'll sure that will suffice.

This game was made for the 2021 GMS2 Amaze Me Game Jam, in which the theme was "Neon".

Credits:

Programming, design, most assets - 1nkFalcon#8849

Player and enemy character sprites - bobbythebobsicle#1931

Music - chenchar#1234

Thanks for playing!
